Translations.Text: (he eesh doot!) kah doh allaah akela hai
na usakee koee santaan hai aur na vah kisee kee santaan hai
aur na usake baraabar koee hai
(he nabee!) kaho ki main bhor ke paalanahaar kee sharan leta hoon
har usakee buraee se, jise usane paida kiya
tatha raatri kee buraee se, jab usaka andhera chha jaaye
tatha gaanth lagaakar unamen phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
tatha dvesh karane vaale kee buraee se, jab vah dvesh kare
(he nabee!) kaho ki main insaanon ke paalanahaar kee sharan mein aata hoon
jo saare insaanon ka svaamee hai
jo saare insaanon ka poojy hai
bhram daalane vaale aur chhup jaane vaale (raakshas) kee buraee se
jo logon ke dilon mein bhram daalata rahata hai
jo jinnon mein se hai aur manushyon mein se bhee
